Package model

Class DB_Model

java.lang.Object
model.DB_Model
public class DB_Model extends Object
DB_Model - Class that performs all database operations - Singleton Design Pattern
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aldegheri Alessandro, Venturi Davide, Zerman NicolÃ²

      Returns:

    • insertTherapy

      public Therapy insertTherapy(int dailydose, int quantity, String directions, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, int IDdrug, String CFPatient, String CFPhysician) throws SQLException, ParseException
      Tries to insert a new Therapy.
      Parameters:
      dailydose - how many times per day.
      quantity - how much per dose.
      directions - instructions for taking the drug.
      startDate - the starting date of the therapy.
      endDate - the ending date of the therapy.
      IDdrug - the drug id.
      CFPatient - the cf of the patient who will follow the therapy.
      CFPhysician - the cf of the physician which prescribes the therapy.
      Returns:
      the Therapy object that was inserted, or null if the insertion failed.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there was an error executing the SQL query.
      ParseException - if there was an error parsing the SQL query.

    • insertPhysician

      public Physician insertPhysician(String CF, String email, String password, String name, String surname, String sex, LocalDate birthdate, String nationality, String street, int civic_number, int cap, String city, String phone_number) throws SQLException, ParseException
      Tries to insert a new Physician.
      Parameters:
      CF - the cf of the physician.
      email - the email of the physician.
      password - the password of the physician.
      name - the name of the physician.
      surname - the surname of the physician.
      sex - the sex of the physician.
      birthdate - the birthdate of the physician.
      nationality - the nationality of the physician.
      street - the street of the physician.
      civic_number - the civic_number of the physician.
      cap - the cap of the physician.
      city - the city of the physician.
      phone_number - the phone_number of the physician.
      Returns:
      the Physician object that was inserted, or null if the insertion failed.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there was an error executing the SQL query.
      ParseException - if there was an error parsing the SQL query.

    • insertPatient

      public Patient insertPatient(String CF, String email, String password, String name, String surname, String sex, LocalDate birthdate, String nationality, String street, int civic_number, int cap, String city, String phone_number, String informations, String CFPhysician) throws SQLException, ParseException
      Tries to insert a new Patient.
      Parameters:
      CF - the cf of the patient.
      email - the email of the patient.
      password - the password of the patient.
      name - the name of the patient.
      surname - the surname of the patient.
      sex - the sex of the patient.
      birthdate - the birthdate of the patient.
      nationality - the nationality of the patient.
      street - the street of the patient.
      civic_number - the civic_number of the patient.
      cap - the cap of the patient.
      city - the city of the patient.
      phone_number - the phone_number of the patient.
      informations - the informations of the patient.
      CFPhysician - the CFPhysician of the physician of the patient.
      Returns:
      the Patient object that was inserted, or null if the insertion failed.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there was an error executing the SQL query.
      ParseException - if there was an error parsing the SQL query.

    • getSearchedPatients

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Patient> getSearchedPatients(String CFPhysician, String like) throws SQLException
      Returns a ObservableList of all Patient of a specified Physician that contains the String 'like'.
      Parameters:
      CFPhysician - the Fiscal Code of the Physician who has the Patients to search
      like - the String to search in the Patients' data
      Returns:
      the ObservableList of Patient that match the search criteria
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query

    • updatePatient

      public void updatePatient(String CF, String informations) throws SQLException
      Tries to update an existent Patient in the database with the given informations.
      Parameters:
      CF - The unique fiscal code of the patient.
      informations - The new informations to be updated for the patient.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • hashPassword

      public String hashPassword(String password)
      This method takes in a password as a String and returns its SHA-256 hash as a String.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to be hashed.
      Returns:
      the hashed password as a String.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The Long value.
      Throws:

      public static DB_Model getInstance() throws SQLException

      public void closeConnection() throws SQLException
